summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4805 for the improvement of the alley in blocks 23 and 24, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street, between 2nd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55480, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
